author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
Call backs depend on private members to have the same name across versions of PowerShell.  Specifically fixes prompts and clear.

@PaulHigin are there other callbacks I need to fix?  I noticed that ctrl+c doesn't work from PSCore6 to Windows PowerShell 5.1.

Fix https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/4615

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @lzybkr I agree now that I've learned how this aspect of the protocol works

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT One of the commits is not linked to your github account.

title: Revert refactoring changes that broke remoting to Windows PowerShell 5.1
